title: Professional Experience
description: A track record of delivering scalable solutions across diverse industries and technologies

items.title: Senior Consultant
items.description: Leading a team of four software developers, responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of the ecommerce platform of a big Dutch retailer. Since I started as the Senior Consultant, the platform has processed hundreds of thousands of orders, generating tens of millions in revenue. Expanded the platform beyond the Netherlands to include Belgium, transforming it into a multi-lingual, multi-country system.

items.title: Lead Software Engineer
items.description: Reduced eight hours of the time it takes the machine to be ready for production by adapting machine calibration & performance procedures to receive data from a ready file instead of running manual calibration from zero. Collaborated with multiple stakeholders to achieve significant alignments and agreements.

items.title: Lead Software Engineer
items.description: Scaled a product from less than ten devices to +230k devices actively used by clients. Implemented CI pipelines, integrated new manufacturers, and developed monitoring services. Led the team responsible for introducing Android-based POS to the market and scaling it effectively.

items.title: Consultant Software Engineer
items.description: Optimized the position-detection system time response to take one-quarter of the original time by developing a production-grade machine learning backend service from scratch to substitute the old asp.net system.

items.title: Software Developer
items.description: Solved parallel parsing and rendering issues for health records, reducing processing time by at least half. Refactored application to use JavaScript promises and coordinated with backend team on pagination and request optimization. Implemented FHIR using HAPI in Spring Boot Kotlin.

items.title: Embedded Software Engineer
items.description: Implemented automated tests and added new features for the hardware which was a cryptographic chip that could be used in any device that has an SD card slot, the main client of this product was the Brazilian Air Force.
